name: PO Reg
query:
select
   po.name as "PO Number:Link/Purchase Order:110",
   date(po.creation) as "Creation Date", 
   time(po.creation) as "Creation Time",
   date(po.modified) as "Modified Date",
   time(po.modified) as "Modified Time",
   po.po_type as "PO Type:Data:100",
   po.po_sub_type as "PO Sub Type:Data:100",
   po.transaction_date as "PO Date:Date",
   po.workflow_state as "Auth.Status",
   po.company as "Company",
   po.schedule_date as "Valid Upto Date:Date",
   po.status as "PO Status:Data:120",
   po.supplier as "Vendor Name::170",
   pi.item_name as "Item Name::200",
   pi.item_code as "Item Code::100",
   pi.item_group as "Group Name::120",
   item.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group",
   pi.qty as "Qty:Float:100",
   pi.stock_qty-pi.received_qty as "Pending Qty:Float:100",
   pi.rate as "Rate:Float:70",
   pi.uom as "Base Unit",
   pi.price_list_rate as "Before Discount Rate",
   pi.discount_percentage as "Discount on Price List Rate",
   po.additional_discount_percentage as "Additional Discount Percentage",
   po.discount_amount as "Additional Discount Amount",
   pi.cost_center as "Cost Center:Link/Cost Center:110"
from `tabPurchase Order` po ,`tabPurchase Order Item` pi  ,`tabItem` item

where pi.parent=po.name and
item.item_code=pi.item_code and po.transaction_date>=%(from_date)s and  po.transaction_date<=%(to_date)s
and po.company=%(company)s
and po.po_type=%(po_type)s
order by  po.transaction_date desc;
